meanings.definition: The quality or state of being reliable.
meanings.sent1: Her reliableness in completing tasks on time earned her a promotion.
meanings.sent2: The reliableness of the old car made it a popular choice among buyers.
meanings.sent3: The reliableness of the alarm clock was questioned when it failed to ring on Monday.
meanings.sent4: His reliableness in keeping secrets was like a sturdy lock on a treasure chest.
meanings.sent5: The reliableness of the lighthouse beacon guided ships safely through the night.

meanings.definition: The ability to be trusted or depended on.
meanings.sent1: The reliableness of the weather forecast helped them plan their outdoor picnic.
meanings.sent2: Customers appreciate the reliableness of the delivery service for their packages.
meanings.sent3: The reliableness of the talking parrot to repeat phrases amused the children at the zoo.
meanings.sent4: His reliableness in always arriving early was like a steady compass in a storm.
meanings.sent5: The reliableness of the internet connection was crucial for their online meeting.
